title: A holiday in bed, and other sketches.
author: Barrie, J. M.
snippet: Kirriemuir, as soberly stated by the Encyclo- pcedia Britannica^ is **a borough of barony and a market town of Forfarshire, Scotland, beautifully situated on an eminence above the glen through which the Gairie flows.

title: A holiday in bed, and other sketches.

snippet: JAMES MATTHEW BARRIE was born at Kirriemuir, Forfarshire, on May 9, i860.
